#summary PDI .kjb template for a data warehouse project

= Introduction =
PDI .kjb template for a data warehouse project


= Details =
The following is a template for a data warehouse project.

<img src="http://www.kjube.be/images/pic149.png" width="70%">

It contains the following steps:
 * pre - pre processing (get files through FTP, disable access to DWH, etc)
 * stg - load staging tables 
 * ods - load operational data store
 * dwh - load multi-dimensional data warehouse
 * pst - post processing
